```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)


file_path <- 'C:/Users/SERGV/OneDrive/Рабочий стол/projects/Final Project/StormEvents_details-ftp_v1.0_d2022_c20240716.csv'


storm_data <- read.csv(file_path)


filtered_data <- storm_data %>%
  group_by(STATE) %>%
  filter(n() > 2050) %>%
  ungroup()

ggplot(filtered_data, aes(x = STATE,fill = STATE)) +
  geom_bar(width = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Frequency of Extreme Weather Events in States (2024)", x = "States", y = "Count of Extreme Weather Events") 

```
